page.title: 05Home Life
page.content: I wake up first in the morning, then I get up and put on my dressinggown. Then I go to the toilet, then down stairs I go to have my breakfast which is Frosties and go to the airingcupboard to get some socks and knickers. Then I go upstairs to get dressed and I go to clean my teeth and brush my hair then put on my shoes. I put my dinner in my bag then I wait for my Mum to get ready and then we walk to school. When we get to school we wait until the bell goes and then we go into class and we read a book. We go to assembly or hymn practice. Then sometimes we read a book again. We do some work like maths or English, Domesday work or co-ordinates and then sometimes we swap over half way through. At half past ten we go out for break.
